subject: Soccer
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Real Salt Lake capped an unlikely run to the M.L.S. Cup title when the defender Robbie Russell drilled a penalty kick into the lower left corner to defeat the Galaxy in a shootout.
snippet: Real Salt Lake capped an unlikely run to the M.L.S. Cup title when the defender Robbie Russell drilled a penalty kick into the lower left corner to defeat the Galaxy in a shootout.
